title: James C. Campbell Endowed Chair for Pulmonary Medicine
description: To establish a chair to support the academic activities (primarily research) of the fellows committed to careers in academic medicine as well as the young faculty in the Department of Medicine at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
marketingContent: To establish a chair to support the academic activities (primarily research) of the fellows committed to careers in academic medicine as well as the young faculty in the Department of Medicine at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
